body: Just to make sure my comment wasn't misleading, the reference in the paper should not be used for the current butterfly, as this project started as a fully new project after EFRI-PULSE project was so delayed to open-source the initial project. We had a very long pause waiting for them to do so but it never happened. You can see the development pattern [here](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/graphs/contributors).
